title: Universal Component Library Schema Template
description: Universal template for documenting component libraries and design systems that works across any UI framework, technology stack, or design methodology. This schema provides a structured approach to component library documentation using placeholders that can be adapted to React, Vue, Angular, Web Components, or any other UI technology. Follows modern design system practices and component architecture patterns for 2025.

libraryInfo.description: Basic component library information and metadata

framework.description: UI framework or technology - use placeholder [UI_FRAMEWORK]

storybookConfig.description: Storybook or documentation tool configuration using placeholders

buildAndDeploy.description: Build and deployment configuration using placeholders
